summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5038 for the improvement of 29th Avenue Northwest, 30th Avenue Northwest and 31st Avenue Northwest, each from West 75th Street to West 85th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains together with fire hydrants and the necessary appurtenances; under Ordinance No. 57906 as amended by Ordinance No. 59025, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
